After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Pr.EXPLANATION: Percentage of eligible customers who enroll in a protection plan, calculated as the number of enrollees divided by the total number of eligible customers.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Pr.FORMULA: (Number of Enrolled Customers / Total Number of Eligible Customers) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Pr.EXPLANATION: Percentage of protection plans that are activated after purchase, measured as the number of activated plans compared to the total number of purchased plans.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Pr.FORMULA: (Number of Activated Plans / Total Number of Sold Plans) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Pr.EXPLANATION: Percentage of protection plans that are actively used by customers, indicating how often customers take advantage of the plan’s benefits.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Pr.FORMULA: (Number of Used Plans / Total Number of Activated Plans) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Pr.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the protection plan’s coverage, benefits, and overall value, typically collected through post-enrollment surveys.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Pr.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding the Protection Plan

After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Pr.EXPLANATION: Percentage of protection plan customers who renew their plans at the end of the coverage period, indicating the plan’s value and effectiveness.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Pr.FORMULA: (Number of Renewed Plans / Total Number of Expired Plans) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Pr.KPIS: ROI (Return on Investment) from protection plans.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Pr.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from protection plans compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Pr.FORMULA: (Net Benefits from Protection Plans / Total Cost of Protection Plans) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Pr.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred to support each protection plan member, including administrative and support costs.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Pr.FORMULA: Total Cost of Protection Plans / Total Number of Plan Members

After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Pr.KPIS: Protection plan compliance with service level agreements.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Pr.EXPLANATION: Degree to which the protection plan adheres to the agreed-upon service levels and commitments, measured through audits and performance assessments.
After Sales+Extended Services+Vehicle Pr.FORMULA: (Number of Plans Complying with SLAs / Total Number of Plans) * 100
